CustomField.description: FRS program only: during a the referral and initial needs assessment an FRS worker uses professional judgement to determine whether a case is going to be simple, complex or only information will be provided
CustomField.inlineHelpText: FRS: during a the referral and/ initial needs assessment, use professional judgement to determine whether a case is going to be simple, complex or whether only information will be provided
CustomField.label: Needs Outcome
